com.javagamemaker.javagameengine.components

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javagamemaker.javagameengine.components.Component
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Animation, Camera, CameraMovement, Collider, GameObject, Grabber, Light, PhysicsBody, PlayerCharacter, Sprite

    public class Component
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the first element in the JavaGameEngine it has a lot of functions as update, render positions scale shape the shape of the component is set by a number of points (localVerticies) there is classes in the com.javagamemaker.javagameengine.components.shapes package which are templates (rec, circle)

      • translate

        public void translate(Vector2 towards)
        This will move the object if the object is not colliding (if it has a collision component) if the component collides it will not continue translating We check all the components Does not check all children's colliders however
        Parameters:
        towards - amount to move

      • setPosition

        position - new position not translate

      • getChildren

        public java.util.LinkedList<Component> getChildren(Component type)
        Parameters:
        type - the specified type of the children to be returned
        Returns:
        if type is (new PhysicsBody()) it will return the children that is a physicsBody as LinkedList

      • getAllChildren

        public java.util.LinkedList<Component> getAllChildren(Component type)
        Parameters:
        type - the specified type of the children to be returned
        Returns:
        if type is (new PhysicsBody()) it will return the all children and all children's children that is a physicsBody as LinkedList

      • getChild

        public Component getChild(Component type)
        Parameters:
        type - the specified type of the children to be returned
        Returns:
        if type is (new PhysicsBody()) it will return the first child that is a physicsBody as Component
